example.eg: He watched the fight in the park.
example.egtrans: 他在公园里看人打架了。

example.eg: The nurses are watching the children.
I can't chat right now; I'm watching a movie.
example.egtrans: 我现在不方便聊天，正在看电影呢。

example.eg: Frank prefers to watch, not participate.
example.egtrans: 弗兰克喜欢在一边看，不喜欢参与。

example.eg: My watch says that it is three o'clock.
The private just spent four hours on watch.
example.egtrans: 这名士兵刚刚站了四个小时的岗。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 守卫, 守护, 守候

example.eg: My watch is about to start.
example.egtrans: 就快到我的值班时间了。

example.eg: Watch yourself! There's a step right in front of you.
The families are keeping watch until the sailors return.
example.egtrans: 家人守夜不眠，直到水手归来。

example.eg: The doctors want to keep the patient under watch.
example.egtrans: 医生想要病人留院观察。

example.eg: Shh! The watch is coming!
You must not sleep tonight.  You must watch in case of burglars.
example.egtrans: 今晚，你不能睡。你必须做好看守工作，以防窃贼。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看守, 守卫, 守护

example.eg: There was a wildlife documentary on TV last night, but I forgot to watch.
The guards have to watch the inmates.
Janet is sitting in the park, watching the clouds.
The supervisor is watching our progress.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 监视, 监管, 监督

example.eg: Watch for falling rocks along that road.
When you drive in winter you have to watch out for icy patches.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小心, 注意, 留神

example.eg: Watch out for pickpockets when you're in a crowd.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 注意, 留心, 提防

example.eg: Watch over him while I call the police.
example.egtrans: 看好他，我来打电话叫警察。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看守, 监视, 监视

example.eg: Watch over the baby while I prepare his bath.
example.egtrans: 帮我看着点孩子，我去放水准备给他洗澡。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 照看，照料，照顾, 密切关注

example.eg: A digital watch displays the time by numbers rather than by the position of the hands.
The birdwatchers kept watch so that nobody would steal the eagle's eggs from the nest.
The lifeguards are keeping watch over the beach.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 邻里守望相助项目, 邻里监督组织

example.eg: I was working as a night watch at the bank when the earthquake struck.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 等待, 盼望, 期待
等待, 盼望, 期待
等待, 盼望, 期待

example.eg: The park ranger was always on the watch for poachers and forest fires.
My grandfather had a pocket watch that he kept in his waistcoat.
I replaced my old watch band with a genuine leather one.
This watch bracelet is too loose.
Watch it! If you come round here one more time, I'll call the police!
Watch it! - the pavement's really icy today and you might slip.
Watch out! - there's an icy patch up ahead.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小心, 注意, 留神

dsense.name: watch pocket
dsense.guideword: dated (small pocket in clothing for a watch) (过时，衣服上的)

example.eg: Cheap watch straps often fall to pieces very quickly.

dsense.name: watch TV
dsense.guideword: informal, abbreviation (watch television) (watch television的缩略形式)

example.eg: One of my favorite hobbies is watching TV with my family.
example.egtrans: 我最喜欢的爱好之一就是和家人一起看电视。

example.eg: You'll need to watch your step when coming back down the mountain.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 注意脚下, 小心脚下

dsense.name: watch your step
dsense.guideword: figurative (be cautious about what you do)

example.eg: He's very irritable today so watch your step when you talk to him!

dsense.name: watch your weight
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (try not to get fatter)

example.eg: She loves rich food, so she has to be careful and watch her weight.
The watchband is available in several different colours.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 潜在危险人物的观察名单

example.eg: The trader keeps a watchlist of possible growth stocks.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 监视列表, 待观察风险清单

example.eg: I need to replace the wristband on my watch because it is broken.
This wristwatch is old, but it is still accurate.
